technical:
* PHP
* WordPress
* UI/UX
* HTML5
* CSS3
* Server Administration
* DNS Routing
* AWS (Amazon Web Services)
about:
Cornerstar Aluminium were another long time client of Dessol whose website was created more than 10 years ago and had become to feel dated.

As their previous website was built in WordPress and this was a tool that the client was familiar with, we decided to take a similar approach for their new website. As the new website had a lot of crossover with a previous project we created ([BSA Security and Fire](/projects/bsa-security-and-fire)), we also decided to use the same theme, tools and procedure.

This website was designed by our external designer but implemented purely by me. I thus acted as the project lead, developer and in some cases UX/UI designer. I was also in charge of various server operations, including installation of WordPress and DNS/SSL set up of the website, as it needed to be re-routed from his current hosting provider.
